META.DESCRIPTION: Organisation mondiale de la solidarité is an association located in Besançon, in the eastern part of France, whose purpose is to collect donations and assist people in need.

OMS.INTRO: Organisation mondiale de la solidarité is an association located in Besançon, in the eastern part of France, whose purpose is to collect donations and assist people in need.
OMS.COPY1: The website is user-friendly. I chose basic colors, black and white, with a Serif font for the headings and a Sans Serif font for the content.
OMS.COPY2: The website is also responsive, which means it adapts to display on different devices such as computers, tablets, and mobile phones.
OMS.COPY3: The donation feature was the most important aspect of the website.
OMS.COPY4: That's why I created a dedicated page for this functionality. It enables visitors to make donations easily and securely.
OMS.COPY5: A prominent "Donate" button has been placed in the footer, incorporating the primary color of the association's logo.

META.DESCRIPTION: ATK Media is a marketing consultancy specialized in GROWTH MARKETING.

ATK.INTRO: ATK Media is a marketing consultancy specialized in GROWTH MARKETING.
ATK.COPY1: The redeeming Christ represents the members who are from Rio de Janeiro.
ATK.COPY2: The Eiffel tower represents the french designer in the team.

COLLECTION_PERSONAL_INFORMATION.TITLE: Collection of Personal Information
COLLECTION_PERSONAL_INFORMATION.CONTENT: When you use my contact form, I may collect your name, email address, and message. This information is used solely to respond to your inquiry and will not be shared with third parties without your prior consent.

USE_PERSONAL_INFORMATION.TITLE: Use of Personal Information
USE_PERSONAL_INFORMATION.CONTENT: I only use the information you provide me for the purpose of addressing your specific requests. I will not use it to send unsolicited information or share it with third parties without your prior consent.

COOKIES.TITLE: Cookies
COOKIES.CONTENT: I do not use cookies or other tracking technologies to collect personal information about visitors to my website.

CONTACT.TITLE: Contact
CONTACT.CONTENT: If you have any questions or concerns about my privacy policy, please contact me at the following email address: hello@errka.dev.
